alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 3:04AM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...POTENT WINTER STORM THROUGH MIDWEEK... .A strong winter storm will impact the region through Wednesday night, with heavy snow, wind, and blizzard conditions for the northeast Wyoming and western South Dakota plains. Six inches or more of snow is expected for almost all of the area, with a good portion of far northeast Wyoming and the western South Dakota plains having very high potential for over a foot of snow. Favored locations across the northern Black Hills area will likely receive over 2 feet of snow. In addition, strong northwest winds gusting 40 to over 50 mph at times on the plains, will support blizzard conditions at times. Further east across south central South Dakota, there will be a wintry mix of precipitation this morning, eventually changing over to all snow in the afternoon. Some areas of freezing rain this morning will produce icy conditions. Some uncertainty still remains with respect to the exact track, duration, and intensity of the storm over the next couple of days, which will impact snow amounts and winds. Listen to NOAA Weather Radio or your local media for the latest updates on this storm. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations ranging from 2 to 6 inches south and west of Custer to 5 to 10 inches elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Central Black Hills and the Southern Black Hills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Southern Black Hills
